verses.roman:
suvarṇa-kuṇḍala karṇe, svarṇāṅgada-vālā
pāyete nūpura bāje, kaṇṭhe puṣpa-mālā

synonyms: suvarṇa-kuṇḍala—gold earrings; karṇe—on the ears; svarṇa-aṅgada—golden armlets; vālā—and bangles; pāyete—on the feet; nūpura—ankle bells; bāje—tinkle; kaṇṭhe—on the neck; puṣpa-mālā—flower garland.
translation: He wore golden earrings on His ears, and golden armlets and bangles. He wore tinkling anklets on His feet and a garland of flowers around His neck.
